About Realfine

Realfine Chemicals(Wuxi) Co.,LTD is engaged in the production of different kinds of auxiliaries, including textile, paper making, food making auxiliaries as well as drinking water treatment chemicals, agricultural and petroleum chemicals etc. Our factory has been focusing on water treatment filed since 1985, providing chemicals and technical services for all kinds of wastewater treatment plants. We are one of the earliest water treatment chemicals producer and sellers in China.

Realfine begun to explore abroad markets since 2010 and products are exported to foreign markets, such as South America, Southeast Asia and Europe etc., which established sound brand image and effects...

Our Strategic Layout

Realfine Chemical（Wuxi）Co.,Ltd. has many branch companies/factories. We have subsidiaries in Wuxi, Shanghai, Shandong, Yixing and even Hong Kong.

Q & A

Q1.Are you manufacturer?

We are a factory and trading company integration, our factory is founded in 1985,specializes in manufacturing water treatment chemicals and providing technical service.

Q2.How to get free samples?

We provide free samples, and cooperate with many international express company, can delivered by DHL, EMS, for details ,please request by email or message.

Q3.What’s your advantage?

1.Production capacity Top 3 in China. 2.More than 3000 tons production month. 3.Send samples for free for you. 4.All products are harmless to body. 5.International well-known enterprises cooperation. 6.Reply in 24 hours. 7.We are factory,supplying OEM/ODM serivce. 8.More than 10 engineers for product research and service. 8.More than 10 engineers for product research and service.

Q4.How to choose the suitable chemicals?

Please send us some details such as the brand and model name or parameters that you are using and inform us what kind of waste water that you treat and application that you want so that we can choose a suitable model for you. If you don’t know how to make test, we will give you more guidance online or you could send us the waste water sample to test.Site test guidance also can be provided if necessary.

Q5.How can you guarantee the goods you offer is qualified?

We can provide sample, COA, MSDS and etc to help you insure the quality. And we promise every batch of product will be tested in the factory, and they can only leave the factory after the quality is qualified.

Q6. what services can we provide?

Accepted Delivery Terms: FOB,CFR,CIF,EXW,Express Delivery； Accepted Payment Currency:USD,EUR,HKD,CNY; Accepted Payment Type: T/T,L/C,MoneyGram,Credit Card,PayPal,Western Union,Cash; Language Spoken:English,Spanish,Russian,Chinese
